Description:

Director - Chris Walas

Writer - Mick Garris, Jim Wheat

Stars: Eric Stoltz, Daphne Zuniga, Lee Richardson
   

Experience a new generation of terror with this chilling follow-up to
The Fly - now available as the ultimate collector's edition DVD!  Loaded
with hours of revealing extras, this all new 2-disc set gives you a fly-
on-the-wall view of an unforgettable sci-fi sequel.

Martin Brundle (Eric Stoltz) might seem normal, but as the son of an
ill-fated scientist whose genes were altered in a bizarre experiment,
he's about to suffer the most horrifying transformation ever experienced
by a human being. Jam-packed with incredible special effects, The Fly II
is just as riveting and terrifying as the original.
